DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study assess efficacy safety extended-release ( ER ) formulation pramipexole comparison placebo treatment fibromyalgia . The objective open-label phase ass safety profile effect Pramipexole ( PPX ) extended-release ( ER ) fibromyalgia patient 24-week period .

Score great equal 4 ( = moderately ill ) Clinical Global Impression Severity ( CGIS ) screen baseline 5 . All female childbearing potential must test negative pregnancy Visit 1 . Examples reliable method include : use hormonal contraception ( oral , injectable , subcutaneous ) , doublebarrier method , abstinence , partner vasectomy , hormonal intrauterine device 6 .
